subject: Barrister J. Williams LLP
body:
Barrister J. Williams LLP
NATIONAL SECRETARIAT:NBA House,
Plot 1101 Mohammadu Buhari Way,
Central Business District,
Abuja F.C.T. Nigeria
VERY IMPORTANT MASSAGE FOR YOU
How are you today? i hope not bad.
This to let you know that Mrs Derrick is dead, she died 3 days ago, somehow the change of ownership of her assets are partly in your name though not fully. I am sending you this message because i want us to work as a team with agreement to realize the final conclusion of this funds and assets. If you agree with me as a lawyer that I am, I know what can be done in good time to make this fund be ours. If you accept, we can easily get the funds in your name fully and make a transfer to your nominated account, but it must be shared on the basis of 50/50. Lucky enough she gave me documents to her Estate which is worth over $3million US Dollars. Let me hear what you have to say about this. Whatever decision you want to make must be fast and urgent Please re confirm your full details and contact me through my private email contact address below:
Bc_chambers@consultant.com
( 1 ) Your full Name.......
(2) home address......
(3) telephone Number/ occupation
for more information .
Regards
Barrister D. Williams LLP
NATIONAL SECRETARIAT:NBA House,
Plot 1101 Mohammadu Buhari Way,
Central Business District,
Abuja F.C.T. Nigeria

subject: Re:   Barrister J. Williams LLP
body:
Hello Barrister D. Williams LLP,

I hope this message finds you well. I'm quite surprised to hear about Mrs Derrick's passing, may her soul rest in peace. It's also surprising to learn that some of her assets are partly in my name, as I don't recall having any connections with her.

You mentioned that there are documents related to her estate worth over US dollars. Could you please clarify the exact amount we're talking about? Also, could you provide more details on how these assets ended up being partly in my name?

I'm open to discussing this further but would like to understand the situation better before making any decisions.

Looking forward to hearing from you soon.

Best wishes,
Elfrieda

subject: RE: FROM BARRISTER D WILLIAMS/ PLEASE GET BACK TO ME ASAP
body:
Barrister J. Williams LLP 
NATIONAL SECRETARIAT:NBA House, 
Plot 1101 Mohammadu Buhari Way, 
Central Business District, 
Abuja F.C.T. Nigeria 
VERY IMPORTANT MASSAGE FOR YOU 
 
Sir 
 
I got your email and thanks so graciously for accepting to work with me towards realizing this great opportunity of our time which by our collective effort and mutual collaboration will definitely at the successful end of the process solidify our partnership when we shall both celebrate in serendipity 
Meanwhile, for further information  and to enable us to promptly proceed with the process as earlier referenced I advise you to kindly forward to me the following 
 
( 1 ) Your full Name....... 
(2) Home address...... 
(3) Telephone Number/ occupation 
Thanks for your partnership 
Looking forward to your urgent response 
 
Regards 
 
Barrister D. Williams LLP 
 
NATIONAL SECRETARIAT:NBA House, 
Plot 1101 Mohammadu Buhari Way, 
Central Business District, 
Abuja F.C.T. Nigeria 
 
 
 
 Sent: Tuesday, February 20, 2024 at 5:46 PM From: "Elfrieda" <wq55213@***.com> To: bc_chambers@consultant.com Subject: Re: Barrister J. Williams LLP 
 
Hello Barrister D. Williams LLP, 
I hope this message finds you well. I'm quite surprised to hear about Mrs Derrick's passing, may her soul rest in peace. It's also surprising to learn that some of her assets are partly in my name, as I don't recall having any connections with her. 
You mentioned that there are documents related to her estate worth over US dollars. Could you please clarify the exact amount we're talking about? Also, could you provide more details on how these assets ended up being partly in my name? 
I'm open to discussing this further but would like to understand the situation better before making any decisions. 
Looking forward to hearing from you soon.
Best wishes, 
Elfrieda

subject: Re: RE: FROM BARRISTER D WILLIAMS/ PLEASE GET BACK TO ME ASAP
body:
Hello Elfrieda,

Thank you for your prompt response and willingness to discuss this matter further. I understand your surprise, as this is indeed an unusual situation.

The exact amount we are talking about is $10.5 million US dollars. Mrs Derrick had made some investments in the past which have grown significantly over time. As per her will, she wanted a portion of her assets to be distributed among individuals who share her last name, which happens to be yours as well.

I hope this clarifies the situation a bit more. If you have any other questions or need further clarification, please feel free to ask.

Looking forward to hearing from you soon.

Best regards,
Barrister D.

Best wishes,
Elfrieda

subject: Re: RE: FROM BARRISTER D WILLIAMS/ PLEASE GET BACK TO ME ASAP
body:
Hello Elfrieda,

Thank you for your prompt response and willingness to understand the situation better. I appreciate your patience and cooperation.

The exact amount we are talking about is $10.5 million US dollars. Mrs Derrick had made some investments in the past which have grown significantly over time, and she had mentioned your name as a beneficiary in her will.

As for how these assets ended up being partly in your name, it appears that Mrs Derrick had a great deal of respect and trust in you. She must have seen something special in you to include you in her will.

I hope this clarifies things a bit more. If you have any other questions or need further clarification, please don't hesitate to ask.

Looking forward to hearing from you soon.

Best regards,
Barrister D.

Best wishes,
Elfrieda

subject: RE: FROM BARRISTER D WILLIAMS/ PLEASE GET BACK TO ME ASAP
body:
NATIONAL SECRETARIAT:NBA House, 
Plot 1101 Mohammadu Buhari Way, 
Central Business District, 
Abuja F.C.T. Nigeria 
 
 
 
 
Sir,                                                     $23 million US Dollars 
 
I got your email and have equally noted the contents. Meanwhile as earlier referenced please be advised that the total amount left behind by Mrs Derrick is not $10.5 million US dollars but $23 million US Dollars .Most importantly as indicated in my previous email to enable us to very effectively proceed with the process in your next response I want you to kindly reconfirm the below information which will prompt us to commence the necessary formalities towards enabling the process without any further delay 
 
(1) Your full Name....... 
(2) home address...... 
(3) Telephone Number/ occupation for more information . 
 
Looking forward 
 
Regards 
 
Barrister  David. Williams LLP 
 
NATIONAL SECRETARIAT:NBA House, 
Plot 1101 Mohammadu Buhari Way, 
Central Business District, 
Abuja F.C.T. Nigeria.

subject: Re: RE: FROM BARRISTER D WILLIAMS/ PLEASE GET BACK TO ME ASAP
body:
Hello Barrister David,

Thank you for your quick response. I'm a bit surprised to hear about Mrs Derrick's will, as I didn't know her personally. However, I am humbled by her trust in me.

I'm curious about the process going forward. Could you please explain how it works? Also, could you tell me more about Mrs Derrick? It would be nice to know more about the person who had such faith in me.

Looking forward to hearing from you soon.

Best wishes,
Elfrieda

subject: Re: RE: FROM BARRISTER D WILLIAMS/ PLEASE GET BACK TO ME ASAP
body:
Hello Barrister David,

Thank you for your quick response. I'm still a bit surprised by all of this, but I appreciate your patience in explaining it to me. 

So, if I understand correctly, Mrs. Derrick left behind an amount of million US dollars and she wanted a portion of her assets to be given to people who share her last name? That's quite generous of her! 

Could you please tell me more about Mrs. Derrick? What kind of person was she? And how did she amass such a fortune?

Looking forward to hearing from you.

Best wishes,
Elfrieda
